titles.title: RTC Fiscal Accountability Act of 1993

To require the President to submit a plan for financing the losses from the resolution of savings and loan associations as a condition for the authorization of additional appropriations for such losses.

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. RTC Fiscal Accountability Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to condition authorization of appropriations to the Resolution Trust Corporation (RTC) upon transmittal by the President to the Congress of a plan to finance RTC losses incurred after enactment of the Resolution Trust Corporation Conditional Funding Act of 1993: (1) by paying for such losses over a five-year period; and (2) without any increase in either the Federal debt or in tax revenues or revenue enhancements.
